data.message: Sad. Another artist gets involved in the BS of politics. Idc what side you're own just shut the hell up. Rap about something else. God I hope Yela never gets political. He's about all I've got left since Petty is gone. Everyone else has to throw in their 2 cents. I need a world free of politics. Everyone does.

replies.message: The day these artists go a couple more steps further than the political placeholders. I dig the creativity from EM, but he knows its runs deeper. PR performances get frustrating.
Compartments, divide and conquer :/
Wtf are you talking about. Tell me a point In the last 60 years where music and politics didn't go hand in hand. He was doing this on his albums 10-15 years ago...
More people should be involved in this especially celebs the fuck do you mean? Do you see what this man is doing to our country?
Who are you to tell someone what to rap about? Gtfoh. Maybe you should turn on a classical station.
Rap was started about politics, you can tell when people don't know shit about rap.
Art that doesn't have a point of view isn't art. It's just craft. Maybe you should get into candle making or scrapbooking.
Yela better not

Why the hell do people think artists, musicians, and entertainers have to be quiet about their views? But yet everyone else goes on fb to spew their views everywhere wishing they had a platform like Eminem to talk about what they believe in.
"Citizens of the country shouldnt have a say in how it is run if they are famous."
Gabriel Gal lots of artists aren't political. It's become less and less over the years. But to say it's all political is untrue.
Denise Ryan making it great again? I turned off the freestyle after he mentioned Trump bombing the shit out if someone. Better fact check yourself Em. Obama dropped wayyyyy more bombs via drone.
Robert Anthony any regular citizen that spews political garbage gets blocked by me. I don't wanna hear it. Has nothing to do with fame.
Also please name one song off the first few albums besides White America (which was about Em being attacked personally) that was overtly political?

And the reason people get mad when celebs talk politics is because we're watching your movie or listening to your music to be entertained. Not hear a political or personal agenda. You wanna do something on the side then whatever.
Ayyyyeeee fuck trump supporters like Eminem said.  Enough with taking up for your racist ideology. You loved Eminem until you found out he doesn't agree with you. That's how sws are.
Hip hop has ALWAYS been political and if you don't like it then fuck you and leave the culture.
A lot of fake ass racist fans exposing themselves like you
Rap was created to voice the issues of the community.  I'm sorry you thought it was just about babbling to a beat.  Go read a book and learn something! If he wants to speak on it he has that right!
Check out the kid NF, Token and Mad Squabbles.
He can talk about politics.. But that line in the sand shit.. Yeah fuck Eminem and fuck y'all too. Telling this dude to leave the culture if he doesn't dig this bullshit. Get the fuck out here!
Fuck you and Fuck trump

Yea he should leave the culture if he doesn't respect it. In case people forgot hip hop is black culture and hell yea if he does not respect it then leave because clearly he doesn't know shit about it. Like Eminem said fuck you.
Love me some Yela.
